name: Limbspasm
description: A horrifying fusion of rat and discarded cybernetics, the Limbspasm has multiple articulated limbs sprouting from its body â€“ some organic, some mechanical, all twitching with erratic life. Its eyes are milky white, reflecting a corrupted digital signal.
dialogue: *Hissing static, followed by a distorted voice saying 'Access Denied'*

flavor.rationale: The Limbspasm is a product of the city's rampant cybernetic waste, scavenged by rats who have undergone spontaneous mutation. The rat's scavenging instincts combined with its ability to fuse inorganic materials has resulted in these grotesque creatures that now infest the sewers and alleys.
